QuestData.Title: A Marine Out of Water
QuestData.Description:
A giant one of those stone creatures killed quite a few marines while we were trying to evacuate the cave. It didn't chase us too far, but ignoring it outright is too big of a risk.
It needs to fall!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I'm not sure what that monstrosity is, but it's bigger than the others that attacked us.
QuestData.RewardText: I heard the falling of stone echo through the cave from here. Nice work.
